# Kernel

## Kernel Attributes

Describes the Kernel attributes

**Attributes:**

| Key | Stability | Value Type | Description | Example Values |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| <a id="kernel-name" href="#kernel-name">`kernel.name`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | The kernel name. [1] | `Linux`; `Darwin` |
| <a id="kernel-release" href="#kernel-release">`kernel.release`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | The kernel release. [2] | `5.19.0-42-generic` |
| <a id="kernel-version" href="#kernel-version">`kernel.version`</a> | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | string | The kernel version. [3] | `#43~22.04.1-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Fri Apr 21 16:51:08 UTC 2` |

**[1] `kernel.name`:** This is to be the output of uname -s.

**[2] `kernel.release`:** This is to be the output of uname -r.

**[3] `kernel.version`:** This is to be the output of uname -v.
